description.zh-cn: 中国材料力学家、光弹性学家，曾任天津大学教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Chinese material mechanician and photoelasticity expert, formerly a professor and doctoral supervisor at Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 中国辽宁省铁岭市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the administration of Tieling City, in Liaoning province, China.

description.zh-cn: 中国的一所著名大学，位于天津市。
description.en: A prominent university in China, located in Tianjin.

en: Chinese Society of Theoretical and Applied Mechanics

description.zh-cn: 中国的力学领域的学术组织。
description.en: An academic organization in the field of mechanics in China.

description.zh-cn: 西北工业大学的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors of Northwestern Polytechnical University.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 贾有权是奉天（今辽宁）昌图人。
description.en: Jia Youquan was from Changtu, Fengtian (modern-day Liaoning).

description.zh-cn: 贾有权曾任天津大学教授、博士生导师。
description.en: Jia Youquan served as a professor and doctoral supervisor at Tianjin University.

description.zh-cn: 贾有权曾任中国力学学会理事。
description.en: Jia Youquan served as a council member of the Chinese Society of Theoretical and Applied Mechanics.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，贾有权是西北工学院的校友。
description.en: According to category information, Jia Youquan is an alumnus of Northwestern Engineering College.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，贾有权是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to category information, Jia Youquan was a member of the Communist Party of China.
